actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide local commodity supplemental feeding programs with the authority to utilize assistance available for women, infants, and children for the benefit of eligible low-income elderly, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize local commodity supplemental feeding programs to use up to 25 percent of the unused assistance available for women, infants, and children for the benefit of low-income elderly individuals.

titles.title: A bill to provide local commodity supplemental feeding programs with the authority to utilize assistance available for women, infants, and children for the benefit of eligible low-income elderly, and for other purposes.
